        Bullet trains are also necessary in India because it shows out advancement, As of  time concent bullet trains are the best mode of transportaion, where we living in fast forward generetion every thing has to move on quickly  usually, people does not like to wait for long hours even though there have proper and flexible timing to travel they do not avail it because sometimes trains does not come and time they may reach they destenation  late so they use there own mode of transporation.  

      I would like to conclude that, India as a developing country need both the Bullet trains as well as the better trains. but it should concentrate on the public satisfication and provide the best.
